scripts.dev: npm run dev:worker & npm run dev:web
scripts.dev:old: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run dev:worker
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/worker
scripts.build:local: npm run build -w services/local-runtime-suite && npm --prefix services/local-runtime-suite/desktop run build
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run deploy:ci -w apps/worker
scripts.lint:local: npm run lint -w services/local-runtime-suite && npm --prefix services/local-runtime-suite/desktop run lint && python services/local-runtime-suite/tools/gen_models_json.py
